response.message: HUZZAH!  I've been asking about this for months.
Is there an ETA on getting this on iTunes?
JNK, my iTunes subscription updated within the past hour.

Are there going to be live shows again?

If so, unfreeze requested: http://chat.stackexchange.com/transcript/512
Meta has a question for putting suggestions for a new name for the "closed" state. Some of the linked questions address the wording of the specific closed descriptions.

Flag weight? SLOWLY I TURNED.. STEP BY STEP .. INCH BY INCH

I'm going to go delete all of that nonsense right now. Seriously, do you want to watch a moderator have a flashback? Mention flag weight.
Never heard about these podcasts... and Tim Post, you scared the hell outta me, now I know what is flagh weight
Who's that "Jeff Atwood" guy listed in the artist tag in the mp3 file?
The description is missing "6-8 weeks" at 39:15.
Hooo boy. Exciting. I used to love this show!
